meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>steal</kanji>, so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to steal</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: What are you going <vocabulary>to steal</vocabulary>? How about a <reading>noose</reading> (ぬす)? Wait, why are you stealing a noose? That sounds like trouble to me...
